name: Feedback Sports Velo Cache Storage Basket
description: Nothing's worse than scrambling to find your pump or spare tubes 5 minutes before the group ride departs. This roomy basket keeps your bike gear in one place. The storage hoops around the edges let you hang soggy booties, caps, gloves or whatever else you’d normally hang in the shower.Attaches to the Velo Cache 2 or Velo Cache 4 bike column.Coated steel construction for durability.8 storage hoops for hanging wet gear.Holds up to 4.5kg of cycling accoutrement.
